Title: Photonic simulation of entanglement generation and transfer in a spin chain
Abstract: © 2016 OSA.We report on photonic quantum simulation of a 5-site spin chain dynamics in femtosecond-written circuits, with engineered couplings for perfect quantum transport, confirming the expected creation of entanglement at half transport time.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
